College_Name: Rajshree Institute of Management and Technology
College_Summary: RIMT (Rajshree Institute of Management and Technology), Bareilly was established in 2009. The institute offers UG, PG and Diploma programs in various specializations such as Engineering, Management, and Science. Admission to RIMT is done on the basis of entrance tests. The admission forms are available at the city office and college campus of the institute. The B.Tech, MBA and M.Tech program is affiliated to AKTU, Lucknow whereas PG diploma and Polytechnic program is affiliated to BTE, Lucknow. B.Sc, BBA, B.Com, B.Ed is affiliated to MJPRU.

College_Summary: SRM Ghaziabad is a renowned educational institution that aspires to be one of the best private universities in Delhi-NCR. SRM Ghaziabad was established in the year 1997. The university is recognized as Category 1 & A Grade by UGC & MHRD and is approved by AICTE & PCI. SRM Ghaziabad offers various UG, PG & Doctoral Programs. It also offers professional degree courses in Engineering and Technology, Management, Computer Applications, Pharmacy, and Hotel Management.

The University Institute of Engineering and Technology (UIET) was founded in 1996 and is located in Kanpur. It has a lush, green 264-acre campus. It provides graduate, postgraduate, diploma, vocational, and career-oriented programs (MCA, M.Sc, M.Phil.), and Ph.D. courses.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Advanced Post Graduate Diploma In Bio-Informatics

College_Summary: Shri Ramswaroop Memorial (SRM), Institute of Technology was founded in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, in 2012. The institution is an affiliate of Lucknow's Shri Ramswaroop Memorial University (SRMU) and is approved by the AICTE. The engineering stream is covered by a number of UG and PG programmes at the SRM Institute of Technology Lucknow.

Greater Noida Institute of Technology or GNIT, Greater Noida is one of the reputed private engineering colleges in India. The college is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. GNIT, Greater Noida is part of the GNIOT Group of Institutions and offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in engineering, management, commerce, and paramedical sciences.

Greater Noida Institute of Technology, Greater Noida is one of the most reputed private Engineering and Management institutes in North India. It has been ranked 143rd for MBA by The Week 2020. The Institute is awarded the Best Management Institute award in North India for Industry Interface by Rashtriya Shiksha Gaurav Puraskar Ceremony – 2019. GNIOT (Engineering Institute) has achieved NAAC A+ grade in its first cycle.

College_Summary: Rajiv Gandhi National Aviation University (RGNAU) was set up in 2013 under the Rajiv Gandhi National Aviation University Act. It is an autonomous public university situated in the Amethi district of Uttar Pradesh. The university aims at promoting aviation studies, research, and training in the field of aviation Industry. It offers a PG Diploma course in Airport Operations of 18 months duration Apart from this, the college also offers executive diploma programs namely Executive Management Development Program and Executive Development Program

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Airline Operation

College_Summary: Pranveer Singh Institute of Technology, popularly known as PSIT Kanpur is a private university in Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh. It is affiliated with Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. The Institute offers courses like B.Tech, B.Pharm, MBA, and MCA. Admission to these courses is offered on the basis of Entrance test followed by UPTAC Counselling.

Santosh Deemed to be University, Ghaziabad is a true academic powerhouse shaping the future of Medical and Dental Sciences. Santosh Institute of Allied Hwaelth science is run by “Maharaja Educational Trust” under the leadership of Dr. P. Mahalingam. It received Deemed Universities Status in 2007 by the Ministry of HRD and University Grants Commission. For the past 25 years, the institute has been delivering quality medical/dental education & healthcare services and offers Degree, Diploma and Doctorate Courses in the discipline of Medical and Dental Sciences. The institute is affiliated with Atal Bihari Vajpayee Medical University, Lucknow.

College_Summary: Birla Institute of Technology (BIT) Noida is one of the ten extension centers of BIT was established in the year 1998 in order to make the education and research capabilities of the Institute accessible to a large number of youngsters pursuing careers in the related field. The Institute offers various Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Doctoral level courses such as B.Sc., BBA, MBA, Ph.D., etc. Admission to certain courses will be done on the basis of the Management and Engineering Entrance Exams conducted at the national level. BIT also conducted its own entrance exam for B.Sc. and MCA courses.

College_Name: Maharishi University of Information Technology - [MUIT], Lucknow
College_Summary: Maharishi University of Information Technology (MUIT), established in 2001, is well-known for disseminating quality education to students. The university falls under flagship of Maharishi Group. The group has 200 schools spread over 17 states in 174 cities all over India. Nearly 1,00,000 students are enrolled in them. The University offers Diploma in Engineering, B.Tech, M.Tech, BBA, MBA, BCA, MCA, B.Com, M.Com, B.Sc, M.Sc & Ph.D Courses. Read: MUIT Admissions

Established in 2006, Vidya Knowledge Park is located in Meerut, Uttar Pradesh. It is affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. and Chaudhary Charan Singh University, Meerut. The college offers a range of programs, both undergraduate as well as postgraduate courses. Vidya Knowledge Park, Meerut has 8 different schools of its own such as Vidya College of Engineering, Vidya School of Business, Vidya School of Fashion Technology, etc. Several courses are offered through these institutions. The major courses offered by the Vidya Knowledge Park, Meerut include B.Tech, M.Tech, MCA, MBA, and BBA with various specializations. All courses and the college itself are approved by AICTE.

Jaypee University, located in Anoopshahr, Uttar Pradesh was founded in the year 2014. The university offers UG courses like B.Tech., B.Com., BA, BBA, B.Sc. in various specialisations. Jaypee University Anoopshahr also offers doctoral level Ph.D. courses in 4 streams.

Rajkiya Engineering College Kannauj is a government engineering college in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. The college was founded in 2015 and is a part of Lucknow's Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University. Rajkiya Engineering College is given approval by the All India Council for Technical Education (A.I.C.T.E. ), the Ministry of HRD, the Government of India, and the state government. In addition to computer science and engineering, Rajkiya Engineering College also offers undergraduate courses in Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and Electronics Engineering with each branch having an intake capacity of 60 students. Check Rajkiya Engineering College, Kannuaj admission

Anand Engineering College or AEC of Agra is a private college established in 1998. AEC offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses including BCA, B.Tech, BBA, BE, MBA, M.Tech, and many more. The college provides undergraduate degrees for 8 subjects and 2 postgraduate degrees. Check Anand Engineering College Admissions

Buddha Institute of Technology (BIT) is one of the top technical colleges in Gorakhpur. The institute comes under the aegis of Buddha Group of Institutions. BIT offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma programs in the discipline of Engineering and Polytechnic. Admission is done on the basis of merit and cutoff criteria of the institute.

G.L. Bajaj Institute of Technology & Management Noida is a prestigious Institute established in the year 2007. It is affiliated to Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University and has been approved by AICTE. The Institute currently offers various courses including B.Tech at the UG level and M. Tech, MBA, and MCA at the PG level.

College_Summary: Kamla Nehru Institute of Technology (KNIT), located in Sultanpur, Uttar Pradesh, is a well-known engineering college in India. Established in 1979, the institute is affiliated with AKTU and offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in various disciplines of engineering and technology. KNIT Sultanpur has been consistently ranked among the top engineering colleges in India by various ranking agencies. In 2023, the institute was ranked 148 by the IIRF .

College_Name: Saroj Institute of Technology and Management - [SITM]
College_Summary: Saroj Institute of Technology and Management was established in the year 2001 in Lucknow. It is a private institution approved and affiliated by AICTE and with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU), Lucknow respectively. It is recognized by the NBA.

BBDNIIT or Babu Banarasi Das Northern India Institute of Technology, Lucknow established in 1999 is a private institute that offers many courses on the Undergraduate level, postgraduate level, and diploma courses. The courses offered by BBDNITT, Lucknow include B.Pharma, MBA, and M.Tech.

Meta Description: A prestigious government engineering Institution, Rajikya Engineering College Banda was established in 2010. The college offers various UG and PG programs in the field of engineering. The admission is done based on the JEE Mains score through UPTAC counseling by AKTU.

Rajkiya Engineering College, Ambedkar Nagar is one of the best and most reputable government engineering colleges in the state of Uttar Pradesh. REC Ambedkar Nagar has always been excelling both on the academic and the non-academic fronts. Rajkiya Engineering College, Ambedkar Nagar is an AICTE-approved government engineering college with a well-established library and labs. Every year a large number of students from the college clear the GATE exam and get placed into PSUs.

Era University, Lucknow [EU], was established in 2016 under the Government of Uttar Pradesh. It is one of the best, private Medical universities in the state, and provides its students with state of the art campus and facilities. The University is particularly well known for its Nursing, B.Sc, and M.Sc courses. The University provides admission on the basis of Merit obtained by the applicants.

College_Summary: Bareilly International University (BIU), is promoted by an Educational Trust. Later on from 2016, starts functioning with various courses to impart knowledge and develop skills. It helps the students to achieve their goals in personal and professional life.

College_Name: Feroze Gandhi Institute of Engineering and Technology - [FGIET], Rae Bareli

College_Summary: Institute of Engineering and Rural Technology (IERT), Allahabad, a premier college of Uttar Pradesh was established in 1955. The Institute aims to have a very active interaction with the industry and has a mission to serve society by training professionals who can be leaders in innovation, entrepreneurship, creativity and management. The campus of college spreads over 26.5 acres of land. It has elegant buildings, beautiful landscaped spacious lawns and well laid roads. It is situated in Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh. It offers under graduate and post graduate Engineering courses.

College_Summary: KCC Institute of Technology and Management is located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh. It is one of the sister institutes for engineering and management studies under KCC institutions. It has approvals from the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and UGC and affiliation from Dr APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU).

Maharana Pratap Engineering College, a private engineering college in Kanpur, was established in 1999 by the Maharana Pratap Group of Institutions. The College campus is spread over 50 acres of land located near Mandhana on G.T. Road, 3 km from IIT, Kanpur. It aims to prepare the students to walk on the untrodden pathway with devoted discipline and internal enthusiasm to take victory in their stride. It offers under graduate and post graduate courses in various disciplines.

College_Name: Mangalmay Institute of Engineering and Technology
College_Summary: Mangalmay Institute of Engineering and Technology (MIET), Greater Noida is ranked 15th for Engineering by Amar Ujala & IMRB International Education Survey and ranked AAA by Business & Management Chronicle. MIET Noida assures placement opportunities to students. More than 200 companies have visited for on-campus placement. MIET offers a degree course in the discipline of Engineering.

Mohammad Ali Jauhar University is a private university established under University Act in the year 2006. University offers courses in Life Science, humanities, science, law, mass communication, engineering, agriculture, and technology.  University aims to provide multidisciplinary research and education on the level of excellence. University has facilities for various games like chess, badminton, table tennis, hockey, cricket, etc. The University System looks for creative and successful answers for its difficulties and creates ways to satisfy its mission.  University visions To make a friendly scholastic environment for attaining to magnificence, advancing creative considering, creating inventive bowed of the brain and instilling human qualities and to give the cutting edge and established training to Muslims specifically.

The United Group, founded by the late Shri Shiv Ram Das Gulati in 1951, provides technical and management education. United Group of Institutions encompasses 09 well-established institutes in Allahabad and Greater Noida. The Institutions are affiliated to AKTU, Lucknow and Prof. Rajendra Singh (Rajju Bhaiya) University, Prayagraj, and approved by the All-India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).

College_Name: Institute of Management Research and Technology - [IMRT], Lucknow
College_Summary: Institute of Management Research and Technology (IMRT) is an institute which is devoted to excellence in teaching, research and innovation, and to develop leaders who'll make a difference to the world. The institute is based in Gomti Nagar Heart of the city Lucknow having an enrollment of more than 1000+ students under various undergraduate and postgraduate categories. IMRT focuses on the low student-to-faculty ratio which is why IMRT is consistently ranked among India's top Management Institute.

Rajkiya Engineering College (RECM), Mainpuri was established in the year 2015 by the Uttar Pradesh government. It is affiliated to Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow, and has been approved by AICTE. The college offers a B.Tech program across three disciplines that include: Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering. Admissions are granted on the basis of a state-level entrance exam. The college consists of all necessary infrastructural facilities and highly qualified faculties for imparting quality education

IAMR Group of Institutions (IAMR), Ghaziabad is ranked 52nd by SiliconIndia Education B-Survey and ranked A+ by Business and Management Chronicle. The institution offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering, Management, Physiotherapy, Law and many more. IAMR has 5 institutes and 1 school in Ghaziabad and Meerut.

Mahatma Gandhi Kashi Vidyapith University (MGKVP) is a government University located in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh. It is an NAAC C accredited university and has over 350 affiliated colleges and 30 departments. They offer both academic and professional courses in streams such as Arts, Commerce, Law, Science, and many more. Established in the year 1921, MGKVP is one of the largest universities in Uttar Pradesh and is spread over 6 districts namely Balia, Bhadohi, Chandauli, Varanasi, Mirzapur, and Sonbhadra.

College_Summary: Maharishi University of Information Technology (MUIT) is a private university established in 2001 and approved by UGC. It offers undergraduate, diploma and doctoral courses in the discipline of Data Science, Law, Animation and Journalism and Mass Communication. Admission to the courses depends on the performance of the candidates in the entrance examination conducted by the University.

Meerut Institute of Technology is situated in Meerut in the Uttar Pradesh state of India. Established in 2007, it is approved by AICTE and affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University. Meerut Institute of Technology provides 8 different courses at the UG level. The institute values the significance of the overall development of personality and to achieve certain skills such as Communication Skills, Negotiation Skills, Critical Reasoning Ability, Right Attitude, Self Image, Motivation, Goals, Resume Writing, Mock Interviews, etc.

College_Name: Institute of Technology and Management - [ITM], Gorakhpur

College_Summary: Institute of Engineering and Technology (IET) Agra is a government college affiliated with Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar University, Agra which was established in the year 1998. The college is located in Khandari, Agra. The college is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education(AICTE) and is accredited by ‘B++’ by the NAAC. The institution offers undergraduate, postgraduate and Diploma courses such as BE, MCA, PGDCA, M.Sc). The top recruiters at IET are MCM Telecom Delhi, Techkriya Advent, Bharti Infratel, Formulaic Engineers, TCS, and many more visit the college for placements. The college offers admissions on the basis of the Entrance test score followed by UPTAC Counselling, University level entrance test, and merit.

College_Name: Dayanand Danku Paraga Gyan Uday Mahavidyalaya - [DDPGUM], Kanpur

College_Summary: Lucknow Christian Degree College (LCDC) provides a wide range of subjects for students pursuing Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses through courses such as BA, B.Com, MA, M.Sc, etc. Admission to the college is both merit and entrance-based. Applicants applying for admission can apply both online as well as offline.

Bharat Institute of Technology is located in Meerut, Uttar Pradesh and was established in 2001. The institute is accredited by NBA and is affiliated to AKTU, Lucknow. It is one of the top private engineering colleges in the area and comes under the BIT institutions. BIT offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate programmes in fields including Engineering, Pharmaceutical and Management along various specializations. Admissions are based on entrance exam scores. Along with this, BIT is ranked 24th by CSR for the best private engineering college. BIT offers the best infrastructure and academic facilities to help students improve their theoretical as well as practical knowledge.

ITS Engineering College, Greater Noida is ranked under Top 10 Best Private Engineering Colleges in North India by India Today and awarded Best Engineering College for Industry Interface and Placements in North India by ASSOCHAM. ITS has been ranked by ARIIA (Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements) as the top 6-25 innovative higher education private or self-financed college/ institutions across India and also among the top 3 in Uttar Pradesh. ITS Engineering College, affiliated to Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University is one of the most advanced engineering colleges in India. With accreditations by NAAC & NBA and approved by AICTE, this institute has a bag full of achievements to boost on.

College_Name: Shambhunath Institute of Engineering and Technology
College_Summary: The Shambhunath Group of Institutions has been headquartered in Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh since 2004. It is a prominent Institute of higher learning. The Institute's Degree and Diploma degrees include 17 UG and 4 PG courses. These programs are available in Full Time mode. The Institute is Affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU). Shambhunath Group of Institutions is a well-known institute providing B.E. / B.Tech, B.A. LL.B., BBA, BCA, M.E./M.Tech, M.Pharma, D.Pharma, and B.Pharma programmes. Students can select one of these programs to further their education.

College_Summary: United Institute of Technology, Allahabad was started by the efforts of The United Group in 2007. It is one of the 9 institutions established by the group founded by late Shri Shiv Ram Das Gulati in 1951. It seeks to nurture students in such a way that they are well settled in their respective careers. It is situated in UPSIDC Industrial Area, Naini, Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh.

Sanskar Educational Group (SEG), Ghaziabad was established in 2005 and is affiliated and approved by AICTE, PCI, CoA and affiliated to AKTU. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, research level and diploma programs in the disciplines of Engineering Technology, Pharmacy, Architecture, and Management. Admission to SEG Admission is done on the basis of various entrance exams.

Microtek Group of Institutions was established in the year 1999 and is recognized by UGC and MHRD. The Institute is also approved by AICTE and is affiliated to Veer Bahadur Singh Purvanchal University and Mahatma Gandhi Kashi Vidyapeeth. The Institute offers UG, PG, and Diploma programmes. Also, it offers a certification course on computer concepts. The selection in different courses is based on marks obtained in previous year examinations.

Institute is situated at NH-58, Delhi-Haridwar Bypass Road, Ghat Institutional Area in the Meerut City. The campus is spread over in 6 acres in land.

College_Summary: Jagadguru Rambhadracharya Handicapped University is the private university established as only one its kind in the world to educate the disabled students. University was created by the ordinance under Uttar Pradesh Govt. It is managed by Jagadguru Rambhandracharya Viklang  Shikshan Trust. University offers courses in the fields of English, Hindi, Sociology, Fine Arts, Education, History and Archaeology.

Nitra Technical Campus (NTC), Ghaziabad is an esteemed private technical and management school located in the economically developed city of Ghaziabad, India. Established in 1974, NTC has rapidly become one of the leading technical and management institutes in India. The institute is approved by AICTE and is affiliated with Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University Lucknow. Nitra Technical Campus (NTC), Ghaziabad was ranked as the 10th Best Engineering Institute by Outlook Magazine in 2020 and was placed at 151st position in NIRF Ranking 2020 for engineering colleges.

Delhi Technical Campus (DTC) is a Private Institute located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh. The Institute was established in the year 2013 by the Founders of Mayoor School, Noida in collaboration with GC MAYO College, Ajmer. DTC is affiliated to Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU) and is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and Council of Architecture (COA). Courses offered by DTC are B.Tech., B.Arch. and MBA. Admission to all the courses are on the basis of IPU CET conducted by the university. Check Delhi Technical Campus Admissions

Goel Institute of Technology & Management is a private institute established in 2008 and is a part of the Goel Group of Institutions. The Institute is affiliated to Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University. GITM offers B. Tech and B.Tech (Lateral) at the UG level, M. Tech and MBA at the PG level in Engineering, Commerce, and Management. Admission to these respective courses is offered on the basis of a valid score in entrance exams like JEE Main, CUET, JEECUP etc. In addition, GITM has been awarded a 3.5-star rating by the Institute Innovation Council, Government of India and an award of Excellence in Education by the Times Group.

Abdul Kalam Technical University, Uttar Pradesh, Lucknow.

College_Name: Mangalmay Institute of Management and Technology
College_Summary: Mangalmay Institute of Management and Technology (MIMT), Greater Noida is ranked 5th for Management by Amar Ujala & IMRB International Education Survey and ranked 16th in Delhi-NCR by Mail Today. The institute is known best for its 93% placement record. MIMT Noida assures placement opportunities to students. More than 200 companies have visited for on-campus placement. The institute is famous for its MBA/ PGDM program in various specializations. MIMT Greater Noida offers degree courses in the discipline of Management and Business Administration.

College_Summary: Jyoti College of Management, Science, and Technology is situated in Bareilly in the Uttar Pradesh state of India. JCMST is an NCTE accredited institution having affiliation with Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University.

Mahaveer Institute of Technology (MIT) provides diploma courses in Engineering and Technology across various specializations.. The minimum eligibility required for admission is 35% aggregate marks in 10th class.

College_Name: Jagran Institute of Management and Mass Communication- (JIMMC), Noida
College_Summary: Jagran Institute of Management and Mass Communication is a private college, established in 2004 and is a sister concern of the Dainik Jagran Group. The institute offers a UG and PG course in Journalism and Mass Communication in academic association with Galgotias University. Apart from this it also offers Post Graduate Diploma in Print/TC/Digital Journalism and Advertising & PR relations. Admission to these courses is on the basis of a Written Test conducted by the Institute followed by a Personal Interview round. JIMMC provides 100% placement assurance to students having 80% attendance throughout the year.

It offers UG, PG, Diploma and PG Diploma courses in the fields of Engineering, Technology, Management, Business Administration, etc.

College_Summary: Set up in 1974 as an interdisciplinary program, the Department of Industrial and Management Engineering (IME) at IIT Kanpur is one of the first in the country to leverage the analytical education of engineers in the training of management professionals. IME IIT Kanpur has been ranked 23rd by NIRF 2023 in the Management Category. The department currently offers MBA, MTech and PhD programs in Industrial and Management Engineering. The 2-year full-time residential flagship MBA program of IME Kanpur works along with the CAPSTONE program. The Capstone Project is a two-semester process in which students pursue independent research on a question or problem of their choice, engage with companies in relevant disciplines, and - with the guidance of a faculty mentor - produce a substantial paper that reflects a deep understanding of the topic. The college is also offering a short-term full time residential PGPEX VLM program. Read More IME IIT Course & Fee Structure

College_Summary: Bhagwati Institute of Technology and Science, Uttar Pradesh was established in the year 2008. It is affiliated to Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Board of Technical Education and Chaudhary Charan Singh University. The Institute offers B.Tech, B.Tech (Lateral), BBA, BCA, B.Com and B.Pharma at the UG level, MBA, and MCA at the PG level.  Apart from this it also offers a polytechnic and D.Pharma course. Admissions to the B.Tech is based on JEE Main scores whereas admission to MBA is on the basis of UPCET scores.

College_Name: Krishna Group of Institutions, Kanpur Overview
College_Summary: Krishna Group of Institutions, Kanpur is a private college established in the year 2008. It is affiliated with AKTU, Lucknow and CSJMU and approved by AICTE for Technology and Management programs. KGI offers various courses in Engineering, Pharmacy, Business Management, Computer Applications and Nursing courses like GNM, ANM, B.Sc. Nursing, M.Sc. Nursing, Post Basic B.Sc Nursing with 2 Year Diploma Courses.

College_Summary: Shri Ram Group of Colleges (SRGC) Muzaffarnagar, established in 2004, has been among the top 10 engineering colleges in Uttar Pradesh.

College_Name: National Institute of Management and Technology - [NIMT], Greater Noida
College_Summary: National Institute of Management and Technology (NIMT) has been regularly featured amongst the top 10 management institutions in India. It offers a wide range of courses in the field of management, law, education, medical, etc at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels. It also has two senior secondary schools in Ghaziabad and a distance learning service in order to extend its services to more people. There are a total of 3 campuses under NIMT namely:

College_Name: National Institute of Management and Technology - [NIMT], Ghaziabad

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, AICTE, PCI, INC, BCI, UGC

College_Summary: National Institute of Management and Technology (NIMT), is an educational group which was first established in 1992 and continues to spread its legacy with 16 Higher Education Institutions, 3 Schools, Pre School and Online Education Program. NIMT Ghaziabad is one of its branches, offering exclusive postgraduate courses in Management. The highest package recieved by student of PGDM course was INR 16.5 LPA and the placement record of 2019 batch was 99.5%.

Eshan Group of Institution (EGI), Agra is a private institute established in the year 2009. The institute offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma programs across multiple disciplines like Engineering & Technology and Management. Admission to the EGI Agra is done based on JEE Main, UPSEE, CAT, MAT scores. Additionally, the institute has a Training and Placement Cell who provides 100% placement assistance to its students. The highest package offered is at INR 14.6 LPA and the average package is offered at INR 5 LPA. Some of the top recruiters are BYJU’s, JustDial, Jaro Education, Amazon, ACE, Jobaaj, Capgemini, Alstom and many more.

Group of Institutions (RRGI), Lucknow is awarded with Best Institution Award by ASSOCHAM and honored with the “Prakriti Ratna Award” and “Shiksha Gaurav Samman” for excellence in the field of Technical and Management education. RRGI Lucknow offers degree and diploma programs in the discipline of Technology, Architecture, Management, and many more.

RV Institute of Technology (RVIT), Bijnor was established in the year 2009 for the purpose of imparting technical education and human values in the young Technocrats. RVIT Bijnor offers degree and diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering and Pharmacy. Admission is done on the basis of merit and cutoff criteria of the institute.

College_Summary: Ambition Institute of Technology (AIT), Varanasi was established in the year 2009. The institute is affiliated to the Board of Technical Education, Lucknow,U.P and approved by AICTE, Ministry of HRD, New Delhi, Government of India. AIT Varanasi offers diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering and Fashion Designing. Admission to the AIT Varanasi is based on the marks scored in the JEECUP entrance exam. Additionally, the institute has a dedicated Training and Placement Cell that provides 100% placement assistance to its students and conducts various activities to enhance the skills of the students. The institute owns a campus on 22 acres Lush green land, on the Mughal Sarai G.T Road,Near Parao Crossing. The institute has increased its student strength from a meager 240 in 2010 to over 1450 today and which is likely to keep on increasing every year.

The college offers Diploma/Polytechnic , ITI , UG, PG Diploma and MBA courses. The institute provides a variety of UG and PG courses in the field of Management, Technology, Law, Pharmacy, Education, Polytechnic etc. For most of the technical courses, the JEE Main entrance exam is accepted here. It also provides lateral entry of students to B.Tech and MCA programs.

It was founded with the vision of creating future leaders in the hospitality industry and the institute has consistently maintained its reputation as a world-class institution. The institute boasts state-of-the-art facilities that include well-equipped and modern classrooms, three fully functional kitchens, a fine dining restaurant, a cafeteria, a housekeeping lab, a front office lab, an IT room, and many more. The campus is spread over a large area, providing a serene and conducive learning environment for students.

College_Summary: Goel Group of Institutions is a private educational group established under the Sri Roop Chand Ramji Lal Educational Trust (RCRL) in 2008 in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. The institute is accredited by NAAC and NBA. Goel Group of Institutions is approved by AICTE and affiliated with Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. It has been ranked in the “51-100” band category under the NIRF Innovation Rankings 2023. It has achieved the “4-star” rating by the Institution’s Innovation Council ((AICTE–MOE, Government of India Initiative)) for the year 2022-23. It has five institutes namely, Goel Institute of Technology and Management, Goel Institute of Pharmacy and Sciences, Goel Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences,  Goel Institute of Higher Studies Mahavidyalaya, and Goel Ayurvedic Medical College & Hospital​. B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, Engineering Diploma, B.Pharm, M.Pharm, D Pharm, BAMS, BBA, BCA, BCOM, MCOM BFA, and other courses, The organization provides 31 UG, PG, and confirmation programs.

Centre for Management Development, established in 1983 is affiliated to AKTU, Lucknow, and approved by AICTE, NBA, and MHRD. The institute offers an MBA program with Dual specialization. The Rameshwaram Educational Society wants to inaugurate institutions of IT, Biotechnology, Media Communication, Medical Sciences and Fashion Design Technology in the coming future with its even now existing and functional Educational branches. The mission of the institute is to provide knowledge with academic excellence and to make the students better technocrats & professionals. The program challenges students to think about the world around them in a creative light and how they can make that dream come true. Lectures, design exercises, and field trips help the students in absorbing the total aspects of the field of architecture.

HMFA Memorial Institute of Engineering and Technology, Allahabad
College_Summary: HMFA Memorial Institute of Engineering and Technology, Allahabad was established in 2008. The college is affiliated to Uttar Pradesh Technical University (UPTU). It is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (A.I.C.T.E), New Delhi & Ministry of HRD Govt. of India. The College offers Bachelor of Technology and Master of Business administration. The college has separate hostel for boys and girls with their own messes. The admission process for this college starts every year in the month of June and July.

Apeejay Institute of Technology, School of Architecture & Planning -[AIT SAP], Greater Noida
College_Summary: AIT SAP is one of the top architectural colleges in the country. It was established in 1999. It offers only a 5-year B.Arch program. The admissions are based on UPCET/ NATA ranks. The application mode is online.

DNM Institute of Engineering and Technology (DNMIET), Lucknow
College_Summary: DNM Institute of Engineering & Technology is a prestigious institute that was founded in 2012, in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. DNMIET is a leading institute in the city offering degree and diploma programs, as well as undergraduate courses. The college also provides after 10th Diploma courses. These programs are available in Full-Time mode. DNM Institute of Engineering & Technology is a well-known institution for BA / BSc, After 10th Diploma programs taught by highly experienced faculty.
